content.content_1: I am a computer technician and IT student with a focus on software development.
content.content_2: I have knowledge in web technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript and have developed several academic projects using these technologies. When it comes to JavaScript, I also have knowledge of React.js, Next.js and Node.js. I also have good fundamentals in Java, a language that I studied intensively during my undergraduate years. In addition, I have knowledge of SQL databases, mainly MySQL and versioning and containerization technologies such as Git, GitHub and Docker.
content.content_3: I am open to internship, entry-level or volunteer opportunities in the IT field. I am always willing to learn!

content.content_2: Associate in system development and analysis

cinelog.description: A website for discovering and filtering movies. Through The Movie Database (TMDB), you can search over 100,000 movies using various types of filters, such as: top rated movies, most popular movies, new releases and much more.

divulgacampo.description: A full-stack website for sharing field research. Register on the site, create a field research and share it on the site.

seocomparison.description: SEO comparison research of SSR and CSR website rendering approaches with React.js and Next.js.

vmmonitor.description: Planning and practice of applying the MQTT protocol for monitoring virtual machines.

chatmqtt.description: Website that provides an interface for sending and receiving messages through an MQTT broker.
